sentences.sContent: It was clear from the outset that there were going to be problems.
sentences.sCn: 从一开始就很清楚会有问题出现的。

sentences.sContent: It’s better to get something in writing right at the outset.
sentences.sCn: 最好一开始就有个书面的东西。

sentences.sContent: ...But at the outset let me celebrate two things data does really well...

trans.tranOther: at or from the beginning of an event or process
